pageContext.claim: “So they caught Fake News CNN cold, but what about NBC, CBS & ABC? What about the failing @nytimes & @washingtonpost? They are all Fake News!”
pageContext.analysis: Both the Times and The Post have seen spikes in audience and subscribers in 2017. (The Post announced at the end of 2016 that it is “profitable and growing.”) Moreover, unlike the creators of actual fake news, the editors of the retracted CNN article have resigned and been held to account.
